novelai.usage:
Enter /novelai with English prompt or tags, e.g. a girl in the forest, blonde hair, red eyes, white dress, etc.
You can also use comma separated tags like those on Danbooru.
Star it: https://github.com/koishijs/novelai-bot

messages.invalid-input: Invalid prompt, only English words can be used.
concurrent-jobs@random: Too busy to handle your request...
(*~*) Have no time to draw a new one.
waiting@random: Monet and Da Vinci, whose style is better for this?
pending@plural: Sure, but please wait for me to complete this one before.
messages.invalid-size: The Enhance mode can only be used for images generated. Use /novelai without enhance option if you are using normal img2img.
messages.invalid-resolution: Invalid resolution for image generation. The width and height of image should be multiple of 64.
messages.empty-response: The server didn't return a valid image.
messages.invalid-token: The token is invalid or expired. Please contact your administrator.
messages.unauthorized: The token is unauthorized, this happens while your account has no a valid subscription. Please contact your administrator.
